segments.text: So how did your end-of-the-year review go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it was okay . I had my meeting with Mitch this morning and his bottom line is that he thinks I need to show more initiative . He thinks that I need to start being more creative .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , not in so many words . But I know that productivity is a big issue for him . Oh , he said the usual things like “ Keep up the good work ” and “ Thanks for your hard work , ” but he also said that he's thinking about bringing some employees into my department . That , to me , means he's not satisfied with what I've been doing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you sure you're not reading too much into what he said ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I Don't . Either I shape up or my job is on the line .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think you may be overreacting . Mitch likes to give everybody constructive criticism and I think that's what he was doing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . If you ask around , other people will tell you the same thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you're right . Thanks , Don . I feel better .
segments.speaker: S2
